languages.text: "Судя по вашим лицам, дело действительно серьезное".
"Judging by your faces, the matter must be grave indeed."
languages.original_text: "Судя по вашим лицам, дело действительно серьезное".

traits.locale_text: "Judging by your faces, the matter is grave indeed."
"Judging by your faces, the matter is grave indeed."
"Judging by your faces, the matter must be grave indeed."
"Judging by your faces, the matter must be grave indeed."
"Judging by your faces, the matter must be grave indeed."
"Judging by your faces, the matter must be grave indeed."

languages.text: « À voir vos têtes, l'heure doit être grave, en effet. »
languages.original_text: "Judging by your faces, the matter must be grave indeed."

traits.locale_text: « À voir vos têtes, l'heure doit être grave, en effet. »

languages.text: «A juzgar por esas caras, debe de ser un asunto muy grave».
languages.original_text: "Judging by your faces, the matter must be grave indeed."

traits.locale_text: «A juzgar por esas caras, debe de ser un asunto muy grave».

languages.text: “从你们的表情来看，问题肯定相当严重。”
languages.original_text: "Judging by your faces, the matter must be grave indeed."

traits.locale_text: “从你们的表情来看，问题肯定相当严重。”

languages.text: "Eurem Gesicht nach muss es sich in der Tat um eine gravierende Angelegenheit handeln."
languages.original_text: "Judging by your faces, the matter must be grave indeed."

traits.locale_text: "Eurem Gesicht nach muss es sich in der Tat um eine gravierende Angelegenheit handeln."

languages.text: 「君の顔色から判断するに、問題は実際に重大であるに違いない」
languages.original_text: "Judging by your faces, the matter must be grave indeed."

traits.locale_text: 「君の顔色から判断するに、問題は実際に重大であるに違いない」

languages.text: "Surat ifadelerinize bakınca... Durum gerçekten de vahim olmalı."
languages.original_text: "Judging by your faces, the matter must be grave indeed."

traits.locale_text: "Surat ifadelerinize bakınca... Durum gerçekten de vahim olmalı."
